definition: to block sb's path/to obstruct/to flag down (a taxi)
to rob/to plunder/to seize by force/to coerce/calamity/abbr. for kalpa 劫波[jie2 bo1]

sentences.english: From Hobyo's beach, three different ships captured by the pirates can be seen.
sentences.chinese: 從霍比亞海灘可以看到三艘被海盜攔劫的船。

sentences.english: They carjack a taxi and head to the power plant.
sentences.chinese: 他們攔劫了一輛的士，向電廠開去。

sentences.english: The masked me help up the clerk and made away with the payroll.
sentences.chinese: 這些帶面具的人攔劫了那個職員，還把發薪薄帶走了。
